text: Krishna Kumar Rishi is an Indian politician. He was elected to the Bihar Legislative Assembly from Banmankhi in the 2015 Bihar Legislative Assembly election as a member of the Bharatiya Janata Party. He is Minister of Tourism in Nitish Kumar cabinet from 2017.My NetaPM Modi Backs Nitish on 'Joining Fight Against CorruptionChief Minister and JD(U) leader Nitish Kumar kept the Home Ministry to himself, newly instated Deputy Chief Minister and BJP leader Sushil Kumar Modi got Finance and Commerce MinistriesNitish’s new team in the saddle in BiharLJP to join Bihar CabinetmynetaNitish Kumar explain your cabinet minister ==References== Category:1976 births Category:Living people Category:Members of the Bihar Legislative Assembly Category:People from Purnia district Category:Bharatiya Janata Party politicians from Bihar
title: Krishna Kumar Rishi
